roguehouseguide-text:
Rogue House Community Server Guide Your Journey Begins... Join the Discord! - Vintage Story Wiki Welcome to Rogue House! Here, we are addicted to chiseling and can stop whenever we want, but we choose not to. We also enjoy immersive survival gameplay with lots of creativity used in building and community play. There are no commands for teleports, no /home, /back or /spawn.
Starter Guide - Progression Guide - Claims Guide - Chat Group Guide Settings:
-75% Hunger Speed
-75% Food Spoilage
-Base HP Set to 20
-Items stored in a Player Corpse on Death
-30 Days per Month
-1 Game Day is 96 Minutes (Default 48)
-Calender Paused When Empty
-Chiseling for Most Blocks
-Rifts Enabled
-Rare Temporal Storms
-Wind Affects Entities
-Underground Farming Enabled
-Proximity Chat Tab With RP Features
-General Chat Linked to Discord RogueRaiden: Server Owner & Builder MorwenAbendstern: Server Admin & Builder Help keep the server running with Ko-fi! Expanded claims available with monthly Memberships :D
roguehousemodlist-title: Server Mod List & Recommended Client Mods
roguehousemodlist-text: Rogue House Mods & Client Mods You May Enjoy Recommended Client Mods: You have to manually install these! 01. Accessibility Tweaks - Allows adjusting of nearly every sound and visual effect and more to help in all kinds of ways. Pickaxe sound on rock too loud? Piercing wolf howls? Turn them down! Open the menu with default F8. 02. Alloy Calculator - Ever struggle with figuring out how many nuggets to use in a smith recipe? Press the default key 'U' to open the calculator. 04. Campaign Cartographer - All sorts of waypoint and minimap utilities and tools. 05. Emote Menu - Press the default key 'K' to open a radial menu with all of the game emotes available! 06. Prospector Info - Keeps track of each chunk you prospect on the map. 07. Step Up - Walk up whole blocks as if they were stairs! 08. Target Dot - This retextures the very large 'plus' crosshair with a much smaller 'dot' crosshair. 09. Temporal Storm Gear - The 'Sanity Gear' meter in the middle will turn rusty when a storm is near. 10. Xandus Inventory Tweaks - A collection of small tweaks to improve the inventory handling. ************************************************************************ Rogue House Server Mods: Ready and available! 01. A Culinary Artillery - Library mod adding all the tools and features for enhanced foods and recipes. 01. Ancient Tools - Mod adding new crafting systems and fancy carts. 01. Beehive Kiln - Large kiln to smelt many items. 02. Bricklayers - Utilizing Expanded Matter, this adds tons of colorful clay and glass blocks along with many decor items. Let your creativity flow! 03. Bullseye - Overhauled Ranged combat with a new aiming system, roles for bows, obsidian & bamboo arrows, iron & steel spears and more! 04. Calendar - Simple paper Calendar to hang on the wall that shows the current Month and Day at a glance. 01. CaN Market - Adds shop blocks for buying/selling. 05. Carry On - Crouch + hold right click with both hands empty to pick up chests, vessels, crates and other things. Do the same action without targeting a block to place some blocks on your back with a speed penalty. 06. Cats - Utilizes Pet AI to add in several tameable cats with a couple accessories. 07. Chisel Tools - Iron Tier tools for significant Quality of Life features for chiselers. 07. CommonLib - Library mod for DArkHekRoMaNT's mods. 08. Doff And Don Again - Quality of Life keybinds to quickly place your armor onto an armor stand, take from the armor stand or toss onto the ground. 09. Expanded Foods - Utilizes A Culinary Artillery to greatly increase the available food dishes and recipes for them. 10. Expanded Matter - Library mod adding lots of basic resources and ways to obtain them. 11. Instruments - Pick one up and start playing some music! Uses ABC files just like Starbound or LOTR: Online to play music in-game. The server has a collection of music loaded, but the mod can also load files locally. 13. Meteoric Expansion - Watch meteor showers streak through the sky, individually or in clusters. Individual meteors that crash down will destroy unprotected blocks and imbed an ore rich meteor into the area. 07. Joy of Sailing - Adds sailboats with working sail! 14. Mr Mannequin - A mannequin to display your clothes! 14. Pet AI - Library mod for taming creatures as Pets or Mounts. 15. Player Corpse - Stashes your items into a humanoid skeleton on death with a map waypoint. 15. Pottery Wheel - A spinning wheel to make pottery with! 15. Primitive Survival - Forms of fishing, animal traps, fireworks, earth worms.. This mod has a bit of everything. 16. Rogue House Additions - Custom mod for the Rogue House server. Utilizes the Pet AI and Expanded Matter libraries. Extra creatures, pets, decoritive blocks, clothing, tons of tweaks and much more! 17. Simple Elevator - Adds Elevator blocks for quickly getting up and down. 18. Scarecrow - Simple scarecrow that keeps some animals away from your crops. 18. Simple Wind Direction - Enables random wind direction that affects entities. 18. Stone Bake Oven - Multiblock oven for baking! 18. Stone Quarry - Use metal plugs to quarry stone in large slabs to take materials from later. 20. Teleportation Runes - An item based 'warp' system. Craft the rune, bind it to a Beacon, then use the Rune to travel back to the bound location. 23. Wildcraft - Adds in all sorts of plants and poultices. 23. Wolf Taming - Utilizes Pet AI to tame wolf pups and domesticate them into dogs. Includes some armor and accessories. 24. xLib - Library mod for skill systems. 26. xSkills - Utilizes xLib for a full Skill Tree. Earn experience for a skill by performing actions under the skill. Get Ability Points on leveling the skill. Distribute your Ability Points to a skill's perks and gain powerful abilities!
